AT0051.title: Risk Email Accounts
AT0051.description: From a defense perspective against gray/black markets, risk email accounts are email accounts that may be exploited by criminal actors. They typically obtain large numbers of email accounts through malicious registration, fraud, and cyberattacks, and use these accounts for various illegal activities such as sending spam, online fraud, and data breaches.

references.title: Black Market Big Data: Malicious Email Accounts See New Surge
